import React, { Component } from "react"; import "../App.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Spotify from "spotify-web-api-js"; const spotifyWebApi = new Spotify(); class Episodes extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { episode: "", user: "" }; } componentDidMount() { spotifyWebApi.getEpisode("512ojhOuo1ktJprKbVcKyQ").then((response) => { console.log(response); this.setState({ episode: response, }); }); spotifyWebApi.getMe().then((response) => { console.log(response); this.setState({ user: response, }); }); } render() { return (

Welcome {this.state.user.display_name},



Recommended episodes

Anis don Demina
